name: PointofGraceFellowshipSermons
0:
”Alexa, open point of grace”
”Alexa, ask point of grace for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start point of grace”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: point of grace
des: Listen to the latest sermons from Point of Grace Fellowship. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
